BR_text.BRdescription:
In auto_encoder.py there is this line which ensures the dropout parameter is valid. This fails when given 0 dropout due to the default behavior of not including the left bound. Also the param_name is set to alpha, leading to a misleading error message:
 Error:
 ValueError: alpha is set to 0.0. Not in the range of (0, 1).
 Original code:
 check_parameter(dropout_rate, 0, 1, param_name='alpha')
 Fixed:
 check_parameter(dropout_rate, 0, 1, param_name='dropout_rate', include_left=True)

comments_0.comment_text: Thanks for the note. PR is welcomed or I could fix it in the next version :)
